title: Digital Courseware-Based Advanced Traditional Chinese Medicine Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) Theory and Understanding of TCM Terminology
context.additional_context: Targets corporate wellness/healthcare professionals, emphasizing cultivation of practical skills applying traditional Chinese medicine principles to modern contexts

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of traditional Chinese medicine (Yin-Yang, Five Elements, Meridians, etc.) with over 80% accuracy via digital courseware.
Develop three or more project outcomes applying TCM principles to modern health management systems using a PBL approach.
Learners can perform pattern identification (辨證) with 90% accuracy when analyzing patient cases using simulation tools within the courseware.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
